DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Test Result Discussion With Patient Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to indicated the date in which the outcome of a laboratory test was communicated to a person who is receiving medical attention, care or treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Test Result Discussion With Patient Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test._An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic._Used to indicate the presence of something or someone._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test.

Concepts.definition: The outcome of a laboratory test.

Property.preferredDefinition: An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.:Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
